channel.title: CVE Feed for JBoss AS 7 -- JBoss
channel.description: The latest CVEs for JBoss AS 7 -- JBoss

item.title: CVE-2012-2312|2024-08-06T19:26:09.332Z -- jboss%20as%207 -- jboss
item.description: An Elevated Privileges issue exists in JBoss AS 7 Community Release due to the improper implementation in the security context propagation, A threat gets reused from the thread pool that still retains the security context from the process last used, which lets a local user obtain elevated privileges.
